title: "Einride raises $110M to build autonomous freight transport vehicles"
excerpt: "Startup Einride AB today announced that it has raised $110 million in funding to support the rollout of its autonomous freight vehicles, which have no driver cabin and promise to reduce shipping-related carbon emissions by more than 90%."
